name: WKInterfaceObjectHorizontalAlignment
desc: Constants for horizontally aligning objects in their container.

items.name: case left
items.desc: Left alignment. The object’s content aligns with the left edge of the container and extends to the right.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Center alignment. The object’s content is centered horizontally in the container and extends equally to the left and right.

items.name: case right
items.desc: Right alignment. The object’s content aligns with the right edge of the container and extends to the left.
